meanings.definition: At some time in the future.
meanings.sent1: We will go to the park later.
meanings.sent2: I will finish my homework later.
meanings.sent3: Later, we can have ice cream after dinner.
meanings.sent4: The sun will set later in the evening.
meanings.sent5: Later, we can watch a movie under the stars.

meanings.sent2: We can discuss it later in the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Later, the bus finally arrived after a long wait.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed later than usual this year.
meanings.sent5: Later, we realized we had missed the last train.

meanings.sent1: He left the party early, but returned later.
meanings.sent2: The rain stopped, and later the sun came out.
meanings.sent3: Later, we found out the surprise party was for us.
meanings.sent4: The cake was eaten quickly, and later the cookies disappeared too.
meanings.sent5: Later, we laughed about the silly mistake we made.
